tool_description: Get global countries, states, and cities data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
title: Referential DB

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.description: Get the country details by country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://referential-db.p.rapidapi.com/country/{countrycode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "referential-db.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cities in a state
api_list.description: Get the list of cities in a state.
api_list.code:

url = "https://referential-db.p.rapidapi.com/cities_by_state/{countrycode}/{statecode}"

headers = {

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "referential-db.p.rapidapi.com"
}

print(response.json())
